definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The landlord aunt is always telling me much information about the Xinkai River.
sentences.chinese: 房東大娘總是會跟我講關於新開河的見聞。

sentences.english: Mr. Lin heaved sigh after sigh. Mrs. Lin's hiccups were like a string of firecrackers .
sentences.chinese: 林先生常常嘆氣，林大娘的打嗝像連珠炮。

sentences.english: Du Niang met with the woman shouted, Zuitian points good work.
sentences.chinese: 見了女的喊大娘，嘴甜點好辦事。

sentences.english: DND has turned out to be the biggest chain enterprise of fast food of dumplings in the domestic market.
sentences.chinese: 大娘水餃現已成爲國內最大的水餃堂食快餐連鎖企業。

sentences.english: The fruit seller palmed off some bad oranges onto the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 那水果商把一些壞桔子混充好的賣給了那位老大娘。

sentences.english: If he refused to come, he would hurt the feelings of the old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他如果不肯來，就會使老大娘不高興。

sentences.english: The old woman sat silent, as if care were pressing on her mind.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘坐着不開口，好像有什麼心事壓在她心頭似的。

sentences.english: Lin looked into her face with tenderness.
sentences.chinese: 林大娘深情地看着她的臉。

sentences.english: In three of these, Madame Magloire cultivated vegetables;
sentences.chinese: 馬格洛大娘在三塊方地上種着蔬菜。

sentences.english: Qin left just to see the big three forklifts , though down.
sentences.chinese: 秦大娘看見大剷車剛抓了三下，就停了下來。

sentences.english: Granny's kindness endeared her to everyone in the community.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘的仁慈心地使她受到這一帶所有人的喜愛。

sentences.english: The old woman told him that she had two grandsons at the front.
sentences.chinese: 老大娘告訴他說，前線上有她兩個孫子。

sentences.english: He made it his business to fetch water for a granny.
sentences.chinese: 他把爲一位老大娘挑水當作本人的事。

sentences.english: The old women are near the table. They are dancing.
sentences.chinese: 在球檯附近有些老大娘在跳舞。

sentences.english: "Madame Magloire, " retorted the Bishop, "you are mistaken.
sentences.chinese: “馬格洛大娘，”主教回答說，“您弄錯了。

sentences.english: The Thenardier silently handed him the folded bill.
sentences.chinese: 德納第大娘，一聲不響，把那賬單遞給他。

definition: big sister/elder sister/older sister (also polite term of address for a girl or woman slightly older than the speaker)
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
(coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
uncle (polite form of address for older male)
erhua variant of 老伴[lao3 ban4]
